summary: Pro-active and enthusiastic self-employed science/biology/chemistry teacher with a background in neuroscience and pharmaceutical research. I am open to any teaching and consulting jobs within education. Feel free to message me for inquiries! Available in Dutch and English.

Processing of safety reports from clinical sites, spontaneous reporters, and other entities.
Review and analysis of safety report information.
Preparation of safety reports, generatation of narrative summary, and reports for submission to Competent Authorities.
Identification of missing/discrepant data to generate queries for site personnel and/or reporter.
Coding of adverse events, medical history, concomitant medications, and laboratory test names within the safety database.
Performing clinical reviews of data from the Case Report Forms with an emphasis on safety.', 'title': 'Safety Surveillance Associate (Drug Research)', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 6174, 'name': 'PRA Health Sciences', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHYMrgj0kgjuA/company-logo_400_400/0/1625146537450?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=mdsR_vhYNfKdfOKTL8xkx8X8zZj93nNeXRDQvxY25eY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pra-health-sciences/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Swansea, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'PRA Health Sciences', 'description': 'My role consisted of providing reliable support to project team members in clinical operations and project management. I worked alongside the project manager by generating relevant reports, scheduling meetings and writing detailed and concise minutes. I was in constant communication with all functional team leads to ensure that projects were completed in accordance with contractual obligations and client expectations. I also acted pro-actively to ensure compliance in multiple areas such as project training, trial management systems, billable hours and adherence to internal milestones. 

My trial experience included study start-up (including kick-off and investigator meetings), conduct and close-out trial lifecycle stages, with an understanding of both corporate and project milestones. This has led to involvement in submission strategies, drafting plans for review, and assisting in the generation of final deliverables. Study experience to date has included therapeutic areas, such as oncology, contraception, and neurodegenerative disorders. 

Additionally, I acted as the lead subject matter expert for PRA’s new clinical trial management system, and was a member of the project associate optimisation and user-generated content workgroup. I enjoyed being a dependable and efficient member of study teams, as well as helping and mentoring colleagues.', 'title': 'Project Associate (Drug Research)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 166627, 'name': 'University of Birmingham', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQEdLkLApRkMcQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519897705688?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=310q4huv672lOuzy_nIz_DYQH3Zb1f6kZP36mNvQkKM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/university-of-birmingham/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Birmingham, England, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'University of Birmingham', 'description': None, 'title': 'Exam Invigilator', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 303928, 'name': 'Lyceo', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHbRgRxhKC9tQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1649236241812?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=2o85BFj32F8kCilt0uCbUIuEfh-CUSS-DPzN_QGgS4Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/lyceo/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands (multiple cities)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Lyceo', 'description': 'I managed and helped organise 1, 2 or 3-day classes to prep students for their exams. My responsibility as head teacher was to give them the adequate knowledge for sufficient end marks in their exams (mostly Biology A levels).

Skills acquired:
Communication- presenting ideas clearly so that students could understand, listening and responding to feedback
Managing and leadership- assisting colleagues with lesson plans, motivating students to work, keeping track of students progress and identifying weak points to work on
Organisation- writing up lesson plans and fit in with the time-scale given
Flexibility- ability to adapt to the different speeds of learning within a group of students', 'title': 'Head teacher for high school exam prep courses', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 4083, 'name': 'VUmc', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHBs6rXsQYqGQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1528382070277?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qssukV6tJSVGr_b8KYm8I7rhamBy3rybZdIm0l2OIno', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/amsterdamumc/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam en omgeving, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Amsterdam UMC', 'description': "In this internship, I have analysed fMRI resting-state data of OCD patients, healthy relatives and controls to investigate the extent of network dysfunction and putative heritability of network topology by employing a graph theoretical approach. This technique provided a framework to examine the local and global organisation of functional brain networks.

Skills acquired:
Programming- By using a graph theoretical approach, I was forced to learn how to program and script in both Matlab and Linux environments. I also had to learn about different algorithms that process raw fMRI imaging data.
Projectwork and collaboration- Managing deadlines, working with colleagues and writing up a thesis after analysing data.
Analysis and critical thinking- Conceptualising the meaning of certain graph theoretical measures and implementing knowledge of OCD research to give meaning to the mathematical models, and to make predictions.
Neuro-imaging- As someone with a background in resting-state neuroimaging, I've learned a lot using different methods such as FSL and Matlab.", 'title': 'Internship investigating endophenotypes of OCD using graph theoretical analysis', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 5570, 'name': 'Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGFG964atm3Ow/company-logo_400_400/0/1682661887840?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=bmk2N5LswEoQY_WJO0VySuxsWNNlfjU6XyPjkGaINeo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/vrije-universiteit-amsterdam/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam en omgeving, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VU Amsterdam)', 'description': "In a collaboration with high schools, the VU allows for the use of their EEG equipment to promote science and allow for students to do a proper research project for their high school thesis. I guided multiple groups and helped them to set up research questions, proper experimental conditions and helped with the analysis of the EEG data. 

Skills acquired:
Teaching and motivating- By helping students come up with their own ideas, but also helping out when they are stuck. The project is supposed to be more difficult than what they're used to.
EEG analysis- As I have neuroimaging knowledge, knowing about a multitude of brain imaging techniques is useful
Management- Managing multiple groups and bein their contactperson in case things go wrong. Making sure all groups set realistic goals, realistic deadlines and having progress meetings.", 'title': 'EEG Experiment Supervision (Profielwerkstukbegeleiding 6VWO)', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}]
